title: Build websites for R packages
text: `MeTEor` R Shiny application offers possibility explore longitudinal metabolomics data. purpose, variety statistical analysis visualization methods implemented MeTEor help user get quick overview data. Currently implemented features include: Dimensionality Reduction: PCA, Modern Tensor Factorization (TCAM) Statistical models: Linear Mixed Models, Mixed ANOVA, Friedman test Prediction models: Logistic regression, Random Forest, XGBoost Network plots: Pearson correlation network, Gaussian graphical model Ridge plots Line plots Cluster heatmaps Volcano plots Enrichment: Map compounds (MetaboAnalyst API), Relational Database Metabolomics Pathways (RaMP)

title: Build websites for R packages
text: recommended option using MeTEor MeTEor Docker container, available Docker Hub. use , make sure Docker installed. Docker installation please check: https://docs.docker.com/engine/install/

title: Build websites for R packages
text: MeTEor also available R package. correct installation setup Miniconda environment necessary. installation `rminiconda` package described MacOS, Linux Windows.

title: Build websites for R packages
text: Please create empty folder ‘miniconda_py_r’ drive C./ . reason MeTEor installation Python necessary. make sure everything can installed correctly Miniconda environment created. problem can arise directory Miniconda installed contains spaces. workaround installation drive C./.
code: if (!requireNamespace("remotes", quietly = TRUE)) {   install.packages("remotes") }  remotes::install_github("hafen/rminiconda")  rminiconda::install_miniconda(path = "C:\\miniconda_py_r", name='miniconda_for_meteor')
